PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02712018-03-12,  ,  IRCC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of RICHARD JOSEPH BENOÎT SHEITOYAN of Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective April 9, 2018.
